citations.title: **[Tutorials]( They offer hands-on tutorials specifically on ML for climate applications
**[Weather and Climate Forecasting Tutorial]( A recent 2024 resource for getting started with ML-based forecasting
**Summer School materials**: Check out [notes from the 2024 CCAI Summer School]( for curated learning paths
See [10 free climate datasets for ML](
**Workshops**: [ICLR]( and NeurIPS host annual "Tackling Climate Change with ML" workshops
**Papers**: Browse the [ClimateSet dataset paper]( and similar recent work to see what problems people are tackling
